content.description: Scramble up lump of rock at base.  Eyeball the first bolt, and decide if you need pro to get to it and, if so, place a small cam up and to the left (long sling to reduce rope drag).  Climb up to bolt, then continue by milking weaknesses and horizontal cracks for pro to the top.
content.protection: One bolt, cams and stoppers.  Rappel from fixed anchor atop formation.
content.location: Located to the right of Baby Beef, on tallest section of the west face of Beef Butte.  Start on lump, climb up to bolt.

content.description: Start right, reach over and clip bolt.  Head left, or, stay on the arete, clip second bolt then step left and up (cams in cracks), or, follow arete (no pro for awhile: take care!) then pass cam eatin' horizontals to summit anchor.
content.protection: Three bolts and some small cams.
content.location: Located on the northwest corner of Beef Butte.  Start to the right, clip bolt, up ya go.  Rappel from anchor atop formation.
